post:
Tecria Ltd. is a Company registered in Bangladesh having 6 years experience in Web Hosting Industry. We are offering NVMe SSD Shared & Reseller Hosting from Tecria Limited.

These offers are valid until November 30, 2020 or until stocks last.

Offer: [https://tecria.com/blackfriday2020/](https://tecria.com/blackfriday2020/ "https://tecria.com/blackfriday2020/")

> First 5 Customers who're ordering **Shared - Starter (BlackFriday2020)** & **Shared - Standard (BlackFriday2020)** will receive **Extra 5GB Storage** Post your Order No. Here.

<hr>
##**Shared - Starter (BlackFriday2020)**

* 5 GB NVMe SSD Storage
* 500GB Bandwidth
* Unlimited MySQL Databases
* 3 Addon Domains
* Unlimited Subdomains
* Unlimited Email Accounts
* cPanel + LiteSpeed + Softaculous
* Hosted in Tampa, FL
* Limited Stock
* ~~$23.52~~ **$7.06/YEAR (Recurring)**

## [Order Here !](https://my.tecria.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=20 "Order Here !")

<hr>
##**Shared - Standard (BlackFriday2020)**

* 10 GB NVMe SSD Storage
* Unmetered Bandwidth
* Unlimited MySQL Databases
* 9 Addon Domains
* Unlimited Subdomains
* Unlimited Email Accounts
* cPanel + LiteSpeed + Softaculous
* Hosted in Tampa, FL
* Limited Stock
* ~~$41.16~~ **$12.35/YEAR (Recurring)**

## [Order Here !](https://my.tecria.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=21 "Order Here !")

<hr>
##**Reseller - 20GB (BlackFriday2020)**

* 20 GB NVMe SSD Storage
* 2TB Bandwidth
* Unlimited MySQL Databases
* 20 cPanel Accounts
* Unlimited Subdomains
* Unlimited Email Accounts
* cPanel + LiteSpeed + Softaculous
* Hosted in Tampa, FL
* Limited Stock
* **$48/YEAR (Recurring)**

## [Order Here !](https://my.tecria.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=24 "Order Here !")
<hr>

Q: How quick will my account be setup?
A: **As soon as payment has been received.**

Q: Are you a Reseller?
A: **No, we have root access of our servers.**

Q: What payment methods you have available?
A: **We accept PayPal & Credit Card Payments.**

Q: Are these offers recurring?
A: **Yes, these offers have recurring price.**

Q: What's the server configuration?
A: **Typically, Xeon E3 with 32GB Ram, NVMe Drive.**
<hr>

## A little bit about Tecria Ltd.

We are registered in Bangladesh [ Reg. No. C-163510 ]. For the last few years, we served only Bangladesh. This year, we decided to go International. Hope, it will be a good journey with International Customers.



> First 5 Customers who're ordering **Reseller - 20GB (BlackFriday2020)** will also receive **Extra 5GB Storage**. Post your Order No. Here.
